resources.string: You will need to update your Steam profile privacy settings in order for the app to work properly.

Hi! My name is Luis Felipe Fagundes and I\'ve been solo developing this app to help you manage your steam achievements. If you\'d like to request a feature or file a bug, please use the issues tab on this [github project](https://github.com/luisfagundes94/steamHunter), or send me an email at luisfelipecf94@gmail.com
